name: Artworld Gaiden I: Progression/Digression
description:
Sometimes you make something that people like, so you get asked to make another one.

Sometimes an old idea that is never realised is reborn as something new.

Sometimes you blow your deadline by a month, and the thing you're making becomes almost entirely about that.

Artworld Gaiden I: Progression/Digression was originally commissioned by Runway for Issue #34, "Failure", September 2017.
